title: Armored Trooper Votoms: Dazzling Funeral Procession - Novel Updates

description: A new web/light novel published by sunrise's new publishing arm, Yatate Bunko. A spinoff series set in the world of Votoms, Dazzling Funeral Procession follows Bojil Don Haliburton, a mercenary who accepts a mission to test a new AT...>
